data: The blare of the trumpets grew louder, like a deep golden tide surge, like the soft booming of the evening tides against the silver beaches of Valusia.
Howard, Robert E. (Robert Ervin), 1906-1936; Rankin, Hugh, 1878-1956 [Illustrator]
